p: The acaricidal activity of T. satureioides EOs was also reported in the literature. Ramzi et al. [ 85] studied the effect of the EOs of T. satureioides aerial parts against adults of Varroa destructor (Acari: Varroidae) and indicated an interesting mortality rate of 50% after 24 h and 80% after 48 h. Additionally, T. satureioides EO was shown to destroy completely the wheat pest Sitophilus oryzae (coleopters) at a concentration of 2.4 × 10 −2 μl/cm 3 after 24 h [ 86].
